For one I wanted to show the girls the importance of helping others, and not worrying whether they were trying hard or not.
I believe that if he is standing out on different corners all day and night, _ the weather is, he must really need the help.
So, when we pulled over to give him some money, I said, "God bless you," and he said it back to us. We got him a hot chocolate and a hamburger because we were worried about him being _ . He was so sweet and very thankful.
